meanings.definition: A person or business that sells goods to the public.
meanings.sent1: The retailer displayed the new products in the store window.
meanings.sent2: The retailer ordered more stock to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: The retailer joked that selling umbrellas in a desert would be a great business idea.
meanings.sent4: The retailer's shop was a treasure trove of unique items waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The retailer's friendly smile welcomed customers into the shop.

meanings.definition: To sell goods in small quantities directly to consumers.
meanings.sent1: She decided to retailer her handmade crafts at the local market.
meanings.sent2: The company chose to retailer their products online for convenience.
meanings.sent3: He playfully teased his friend that he would retailer cookies on the street corner.
meanings.sent4: The idea to retailer fresh produce from the farm was a hit with the community.
meanings.sent5: They planned to retailer their homemade jams at the upcoming fair.
